Class Merchant

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hero
      • Merchant

  • public class Merchant
extends Hero
    A Merchant is a type of hero which can be played in the game. Each Merchant object represents one hero. A team containing Merchants will receive a discount at the shop.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

      An extended string description of the hero.

      The maximum health the hero can have.

      A brief string description of the hero's special ability.
      private static java.lang.String TYPE
      A string description of the hero's type.
